The parameter response_type is missing or response_type is invalid.
The parameter grant_type is missing or the grant_type is illegal.
Callback address is invalid, common reasons please see: Callback address common problems and modification methods
The HTTP request is not a post method.

access token expired. The token expiration time is 3 months. If the stored access token expires, please go through the login process again, and obtain a new access token value by using the Authorization_Code to obtain the Access_Token or using the Implicit_Grant method to obtain the Access_Token.

access token abolished. The token is recycled, or deleted by the user. Please go through the login process again, and obtain a new access token value according to obtaining Access_Token by using Authorization_Code or obtaining Access_Token by using Implicit_Grant.
Failed to get the code value.
Failed to exchange code for access token value.
code is reused. The code is valid for one time. At this time, the developer should guide the user to re-login for authorization and obtain the code again, instead of retrying the token interface
Failed to obtain access token value.
Failed to get refresh token value.
Failed to get the list of permissions that the app has.
Failed to obtain the permission list of a certain OpenID for a certain appid.
Get full api information and full group information.
Failed to set the user's authorization API list for an app.
Failed to set the user's authorization time for an app.
The user has not authorized the api, or the user has deleted the permission of the api on the Tencent side. Please go through the login and authorization process again to authorize the API.
The third-party application does not have permission to operate the api. Please send an email to apply for OpenAPI permission.
Overload, can be used when it is not subdivided at the beginning.
The AppKey of RefreshToken is illegal.
Wrong sign, Md5 verification failed, the request signature is inconsistent with the signature filled in the official website.
OPENID decryption failed, usually openid and appid do not match.
APPID does not have permission to obtain paytoken and openid
ip does not have permission to obtain user login information
The uin parameter is missing when querying the user's recent login records
The user has no recent authorization record
APPID does not have permission to use skey to change code or token
ip does not have permission to use interface
The requested application does not exist.
The request parameter is missing appid.
Login request is restricted, please log in later.
Failed to obtain user authorization information.
Failed to obtain application authorization information
Failed to obtain APP info information
Failed to verify APP info signature information
